name: Riptide: Jump the Shark
description:
Be the shark! Eat as many people as you can before perishing to the bullet hell of dropping sea mines and coast guard helicopters. Left and Right to move, Space to dive. Dive deep and soar through the air to snack on the tasty humans!

Credits:

Ville Valtiala - Programming, Graphics

Pyry Takkunen - Programming

Reino Hämäläinen - Programming

Tomi Toikka - UI, Graphics

Panu Palm - Music

Made at FGJ Catland Tampere #GGJ2017 #FGJ17
